sentences.en: All attempts to control inflation have failed.
sentences.cn: 控制通货膨胀的所有努力都失败了。

sentences.en: An attempt by anti-abortionists to tighten the rules was defeated.
sentences.cn: 反堕胎者所作的加强法规的尝试失败了。

sentences.en: An attempt was then made to dive the sump.
sentences.cn: 之后曾尝试潜入污水坑。

sentences.en: Family control would prevent any hostile takeover or greenmail attempt.
sentences.cn: 家族管理可以防止任何恶意收购或绿票讹诈的企图。

sentences.en: He caught her arm in a subconscious attempt to detain her.
sentences.cn: 他下意识地抓住她的胳膊想挽留她。

sentences.en: He made no attempt to conceal his dislike of me.
sentences.cn: 他毫不掩饰对我的厌恶。

sentences.en: He made no attempt to hide his anger.
sentences.cn: 他毫不掩饰自己的愤怒。

sentences.en: More than once, depression drove him to attempt suicide.
sentences.cn: 抑郁症使他不止一次地企图自杀。

sentences.en: Schools should not compete with each other or attempt to poach pupils.
sentences.cn: 学校之间不应该相互竞争，也不应该企图挖走彼此的学生。

sentences.en: She passed her driving test at the first attempt.
sentences.cn: 她第一次考驾驶执照就通过了。

sentences.en: Some people unluckily achieve suicide when they only meant to attempt it.
sentences.cn: 一些人只是想尝试一下自杀，但却不幸真的身亡了。

sentences.en: The authorities have said they will attempt to maintain essential services.
sentences.cn: 当局已表示他们将努力维持公共基础服务。

sentences.en: The first British attempt to colonize Ireland was in the twelfth century.
sentences.cn: 英国最早尝试在爱尔兰开拓殖民地是在12世纪。

sentences.en: These feelings are likely to make people attempt to overthrow the system.
sentences.cn: 这些情绪有可能促使人们想要推翻现行的体制。

sentences.en: They are meeting in Lusaka in an attempt to reach a compromise.
sentences.cn: 他们在卢萨卡举行会谈试图达成妥协。

sentences.en: They spread tales about her in an attempt to devalue her work.
sentences.cn: 他们散布一些有关她的流言，企图贬低她的工作。

sentences.en: Until this week, every attempt to tighten up the law had failed.
sentences.cn: 到本周为止，一切旨在严格执法的努力都失败了。

sentences.en: We think an attempt to bully them into submission would be counterproductive.
sentences.cn: 我们认为试图迫使他们屈服会适得其反。

sentences.en: Weather conditions prevented them from attempting the jump.
sentences.cn: 天气状况使他们无法尝试跳伞。

phrases.tran_cn: 想做做不到的事；缘木求鱼

trans.tran_en: an act of trying to do something, especially something difficult
an act of trying to do something, especially something difficult

trans.tran_cn: 企图， 试图； 努力， 尝试
trans.tran_en: an act of trying to do something, especially something difficult
an act of trying to do something, especially something difficult
an act of trying to do something, especially something difficult
to try to do something, especially something difficult

trans.tran_cn: 尝试， 试图， 努力
trans.tran_en: to try to do something, especially something difficult
an act of trying to do something, especially something difficult
